_fem.Ip: polar moment of inertia scaled with beam density per unit length (rho*Ip), [kgm**2/m]
_fem.d: distance from cross-sectional CG to the elastic axis, positive when the CG is towards the LE wrt. the elastic axis, [m]
_fem.bc: boundary condition, FF -> free-free, CF -> clamped-free

_aero.ay: [0, 1],  span-wise position of the strips as fraction of wing semi-span, [-]
_aero.ac: [0.50, 0.50],  distance to the beam axis as a fraction of the chord measured from the LE, [-]

_dmo.ay: [1], span-wise position of the discrete mass objects as fraction of wing semi-span, [-]
_dmo.m: [0.0417], mass of the discrete mass objects, [kg]
_dmo.d: [0.0], distance of the discrete mass objects to the elastic axis, positive when the mass is towards the LE wrt. the elastic axis, [m]
_dmo.I0: [0.9753e-4], moment of inertia the discrete mass objects (around it's own CG), [kgm**2]
